SELECT l.lo_id,l.eg_id,l.eu_id, l.ts_id ,t.it_id,ls.ls_id,m.tm_id,g.eg_special_context,u.eu_receipt_name,u.eu_receipt_phone,u.eu_sender_name,u.eu_sender_phone,t.it_name,ls.ls_context,m.tm_type FROM logistics_orders l INNER JOIN express_goods g ON l.eg_id=g.eg_id INNER JOIN express_user u ON l.eu_id=u.eu_id INNER JOIN item_type t ON g.it_id=t.it_id INNER JOIN transportation_status s ON l.ts_id=s.ts_id INNER JOIN logistics_status ls ON s.ls_id=ls.ls_id INNER JOIN transport_means m ON l.tm_id=m.tm_id where 1=1
and t.it_id=${id}
and s.ep_id like '%${select01}%'
AND s.ec_id like '%${select02}%'
AND s.ea_id like '%${select03}%'
and (u.eu_receipt_name like '%${name}%' or u.eu_sender_name like '%${name}%')
limit #{page},#{limit}
